name: The Medic
description: Look, people are gonna get hurt. You may not be able to prevent it from happening, but you can do your best to patch them up when it does. You have decades of experience with traumatic injuries, and you are as prepared as anybody could possibly be for treating diseases caused by alien pathogens.

moves.name: Surgical precision
moves.description: You have steady hands even under great stress (+1 act under pressure)

moves.name: CPR Training
moves.description: You prevent other explorers from dying when they suffer a fatal amount of harm on a 10+ act under pressure roll

moves.name: Get them to the infirmary!
moves.description: You can protect someone by escorting them away from danger. You take no harm from successful protect someone rolls when doing this

moves.name: Combat medic
moves.description: You're not just a doctor, you've got some combat experience (+1 kick some ass)

moves.name: Safety net
moves.description: Other explorers can take bolder actions since you've got their back (+1 help out)

moves.name: Epidemiologist
moves.description: You can identify vectors of disease at a glance (+1 investigate, read a bad situation)

moves.name: Miracle of medicine
moves.description: Using what you've learned from alien technology and biology, you can create incredible medicines and treatments (+1 reverse the polarity)

items.name: Defibrillator
tags: bring someone back from the brink of death

items.name: Surgical tools
tags: treat unstable wounds in the field

items.name: Adrenaline shots
tags: keep someone going even when severely injured
